description: An XML-based format for a chart that is editable or dynamically generated from a data source.  File extension .odc is used for a free-standing chart.   May be embedded within other document formats in the OpenDocument Format (ODF) family.  Documented in ODF 1.2 Part 1.
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="formatCategory">still-image</field><field name="filenameExtension">odc, otc</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
name: OpenDocument Chart Document Format (ODC), Version 1.2.  Part of OASIS Open Document Format for Office Applications, Version 1.2 and the equivalent ISO 26300-1:2015.

relations.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
